title: (x) narrow modern sans used in Nike Women ad - FF Dax {Marc O}
content:
Can anybody please tell me the name of font the used in the following image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416225853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gx_top_4785.jpg)
  
for "Last week to submit your video!"

Or this:  
 [http://c.email-nike.com/email\_domains/nie/1748/eng/img/hd\_top.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416225853/http:/c.email-nike.com/email_domains/nie/1748/eng/img/hd_top.gif "http://c.email-nike.com/email\_domains/nie/1748/eng/img/hd\_top.gif")

Nike uses it for many campaigns.

Thanks!
author: ozi

comments.content:
Ozi, you'll get better response by posting requests like this in the Type ID Board here at Typophile.

The font you're after is [FF Dax.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416225853/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=dax&image.x=0&image.y=0)
